summary: Policy modules for administrative functions, such as package management.

module.name: bootloader
module.summary: Policy for the kernel modules, kernel image, and bootloader.

interface.name: bootloader_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute bootloader in the bootloader domain.

interface.name: bootloader_exec
interface.summary: Execute bootloader in the caller domain.

interface.name: bootloader_run
interface.summary: Execute bootloader interactively and do a domain transition to the bootloader domain.

interface.name: bootloader_read_config
interface.summary: Read the bootloader configuration file.

interface.name: bootloader_rw_config
interface.summary: Read and write the bootloader configuration file.

interface.name: bootloader_manage_config
interface.summary: Manage the bootloader configuration file.

interface.name: bootloader_rw_tmp_files
interface.summary: Read and write the bootloader temporary data in /tmp.

interface.name: bootloader_create_runtime_file
interface.summary: Read and write the bootloader temporary data in /tmp.

interface.name: bootloader_filetrans_config
interface.summary: Type transition files created in /etc

module.name: consoletype
module.summary: Determine of the console connected to the controlling terminal.

interface.name: consoletype_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute consoletype in the consoletype domain.

interface.name: consoletype_run
interface.summary: Execute consoletype in the consoletype domain, and allow the specified role the consoletype domain.

interface.name: consoletype_exec
interface.summary: Execute consoletype in the caller domain.

interface.name: dmesg_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute dmesg in the dmesg domain.

interface.name: dmesg_exec
interface.summary: Execute dmesg in the caller domain.

interface.name: netutils_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute network utilities in the netutils domain.

interface.name: netutils_run
interface.summary: Execute network utilities in the netutils domain, and allow the specified role the netutils domain.

interface.name: netutils_exec
interface.summary: Execute network utilities in the caller domain.

interface.name: netutils_signal
interface.summary: Send generic signals to network utilities.

interface.name: netutils_domtrans_ping
interface.summary: Execute ping in the ping domain.

interface.name: netutils_kill_ping
interface.summary: Send a kill (SIGKILL) signal to ping.

interface.name: netutils_signal_ping
interface.summary: Send generic signals to ping.

interface.name: netutils_run_ping
interface.summary: Execute ping in the ping domain, and allow the specified role the ping domain.

interface.name: netutils_run_ping_cond
interface.summary: Conditionally execute ping in the ping domain, and allow the specified role the ping domain.

interface.name: netutils_exec_ping
interface.summary: Execute ping in the caller domain.

interface.name: netutils_domtrans_traceroute
interface.summary: Execute traceroute in the traceroute domain.

interface.name: netutils_run_traceroute
interface.summary: Execute traceroute in the traceroute domain, and allow the specified role the traceroute domain.

interface.name: netutils_run_traceroute_cond
interface.summary: Conditionally execute traceroute in the traceroute domain, and allow the specified role the traceroute domain.

interface.name: netutils_exec_traceroute
interface.summary: Execute traceroute in the caller domain.

desc.p: Allow confined users the ability to execute the ping and traceroute commands.

module.name: su
module.summary: Run shells with substitute user and group

desc.p: This template creates a derived domain which is allowed to change the linux user id, to run shells as a different user.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.

template.name: su_role_template
template.summary: The role template for the su module.

param.name: role_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user role (e.g., user is the prefix for user_r).

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

interface.name: su_exec
interface.summary: Execute su in the caller domain.

module.name: sudo
module.summary: Execute a command with a substitute user

template.name: sudo_role_template
template.summary: The role template for the sudo module.

desc.p: This template creates a derived domain which is allowed to change the linux user id, to run commands as a different user.

param.name: role_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user role (e.g., user is the prefix for user_r).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The user domain associated with the role.

interface.name: sudo_sigchld
interface.summary: Send a SIGCHLD signal to the sudo domain.

interface.name: sudo_exec
interface.summary: Allow execute sudo in called domain. This interfaces is added for nova-stack policy.

interface.name: usermanage_domtrans_chfn
interface.summary: Execute chfn in the chfn domain.

interface.name: usermanage_run_chfn
interface.summary: Execute chfn in the chfn domain, and allow the specified role the chfn domain.

interface.name: usermanage_domtrans_groupadd
interface.summary: Execute groupadd in the groupadd domain.

interface.name: usermanage_access_check_groupadd
interface.summary: Check access to the groupadd executable.

interface.name: usermanage_run_groupadd
interface.summary: Execute groupadd in the groupadd domain, and allow the specified role the groupadd domain.

interface.name: usermanage_domtrans_passwd
interface.summary: Execute passwd in the passwd domain.

interface.name: usermanage_kill_passwd
interface.summary: Send sigkills to passwd.

interface.name: usermanage_check_exec_passwd
interface.summary: Check if the passwd binary is executable.

interface.name: usermanage_run_passwd
interface.summary: Execute passwd in the passwd domain, and allow the specified role the passwd domain.

interface.name: usermanage_access_check_passwd
interface.summary: Check access to the passwd executable

interface.name: usermanage_domtrans_admin_passwd
interface.summary: Execute password admin functions in the admin passwd domain.

interface.name: usermanage_run_admin_passwd
interface.summary: Execute passwd admin functions in the admin passwd domain, and allow the specified role the admin passwd domain.

interface.name: usermanage_dontaudit_use_useradd_fds
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to use useradd fds.

interface.name: usermanage_domtrans_useradd
interface.summary: Execute useradd in the useradd domain.

interface.name: usermanage_check_exec_useradd
interface.summary: Check if the useradd binaries are executable.

interface.name: usermanage_run_useradd
interface.summary: Execute useradd in the useradd domain, and allow the specified role the useradd domain.

interface.name: usermanage_access_check_useradd
interface.summary: Check access to the useradd executable.

interface.name: usermanage_read_crack_db
interface.summary: Read the crack database.
